title: Prince Takaoka's Voyage
alternative_title: 高丘親王航海記 ; Les Voyages Du Prince Takaoka ; Takaoka Shinnou Koukaiki ; Takaoka's Travels
status: 高丘親王航海記 ; Les Voyages Du Prince Takaoka ; Takaoka Shinnou Koukaiki ; Takaoka's Travels
description:
Description :
        When he was young, Prince Takaoka had been told stories of India by Fujiwara no Yakushi, the favorite concubine of his father, as a bedtime story, and he had longed for that land. Decades later, as he grew up, he set out on an exotic, mysterious and fantastical journey to make his dream come true. A bold manga artist draws the towering mountain in the history of fantasy literature with a neat and mysterious look. A full-fledged comic adaptation.
